inn1.comm: Haider gets his delivery to swing in to Salman Butt but on the legs and its flicked to square leg.
shifts his line to around off and middle and Butt leans forward to defend

Would you believe it? Hong Kong have got rid of Butt for a duck. After bringing two deliveries in to the batsman, Haider took this one away and Salman stretched across to cover drive but edged it behind. The fielders are over joyed and why not.
nice probing delivery around the off stump and Younis pushed it to covers where it's mis fielded as two fielders converge and neither pick up the ball
again on target around that off stump and Younis leans across, opens the bat-face and guides to backward point.
lovely outswinger from Haider. It curved away after landing on a length around off stump. Younis covers his off stump and shoulders arms. Good over that.
ambles in with a short run up and serves a full one outside off with hint of out swing and Malik gets an inside edge to an intended off drive
outside off, moving away and Malik lets it go past him
moves in with the angle, Malik can't get bat to ball on the glance and will pick up a leg bye
beaten outside off stump. Done in by the swing. It was full and Younis was sucked into a off drive but the ball came back in and went through between bat and pad gap
fuller and drifting to middle and leg and Younis tucks it through the midwicket gap.
around that off stump and Maliks gets forward to defend to the off side
full pitched outside off stump and driven to mid-off
beaten on the cut. Done in by the lack of bounce this time. Outside off, from short of length and Younis shaped to cut but the ball didn't bounce as much as he thought it would
And now an lemon cut. Inside edge just past the off stump. Younis survives. Full and outside off, Haider got it to straighten and Younis went for an flamboyant cover drive
gets across to let a length delivery outside off go through to the 'keeper
short of length and well outside the off stump, Younis makes contact with the toe end of the bat on the cut shot and the ball rolls over to backward point
retains the strike with a dab to right of mid-on for a single
goes back and across to cut to wide third man
another inside edge for Malik. A touch late in leaning across and the bat came outside the line of a delivery that shaped in from outside off.
gets forward quickly and drives a similar full delivery to covers
well outside off stump and Malik doesn't offer a stroke
again well outside off, Malik doesn't move his front foot all that much; just has a waft at it and the ball rolls over to the off side
curving in to the off and middle, trying for the lbw, squeezed through backward square leg
swinging delivery outside off stump, left alone. The swing started early in the trajectory
full delivery, again hint of outswing, driven to covers
a touch outside off stump and again Haider gets some outswing, left alone. Impressive stuff from Haider here.
the straighter one and Younis leans forward, takes care not to get his pad in the way and taps the ball close on the off side for a quick single
drags it short of length, on the off stump and Malik stands tall to punch it back to him
takes this one away from a length, left alone.
short of length delivery and well outside the off stump, Malik crashes it to point where it's mis fielded
just outside the off stump, pushed to covers. Aamir Sohail reckons Irfan is growing in confidence. The follow through has increased and there is more effort at the release."
well outside the off stump and Younis wrists it through cover point
outside off stump and Younis wants to whip lash it away but doesn't get the timing right and the ball limps away to point
stretches across to square drive a overpitched delivery well outside off stump but hits it straight to backward point
on the off stump line, shapes in a touch, dabbed to midwicket
some swing outside off but it starts too early in the trajectory and Younis waits for it to die out before driving the full delivery through covers
wide outside off stump
closer to the off stump and Younis guides to left of point where it's fielded well by Zain Abbas and what's more he fires in a direct hit at the non-striker's end but Malik is there in time.
leans forward to drive a full pitched delivery to extra cover
a touch short in length, outside off and Younis mistimes the cut shot
full and straight, turned past square leg
walks down the track, turns a length delivery on the off and middle to right of mid-on
outside off, on a length, driven to mid-off
just outside off stump, on a length, worked to mid-on
outside off stump and cut down to third man
on the pads and Younis clips it past square leg
walks across and drives a length delivery on the up to mid-off
fuller, straighter, Younis takes out the left leg from the line and whips it to square leg
down the leg side. Wide called.
cuts in a touch, Malik is a tad surprised, gets cramped up but manages to adjust and taps it to the off side
Pretty little straight drive. He walked into shot and there was no need to run as the ball sped past mid-off
full pitched outside leg stump and Malik whips it through midwicket
Three in a row. Haider bowled the first one full, the second one outside leg and this was short and outside off. Malik cut it hard to the left of the diving point fielder
drifts on to the pads, tucked to fine leg
The fourth boundary of the over. On drive. Full pitched on the middle and driven to left of mid-on fielder
well outside off stump, Malik reaches across and cuts to point
straighter, driven to mid-on
short and outside off and Malik cuts it up and over point
After a cautious start Pakistan have begun to flow. Malik started it with three fours in the last over and here he is, driving a full length delivery past mid-on
Moves back and across to cut past point. The floodgates are officially open.
leans forward to push a length delivery through cover point
pushed to wide midwicket and they rush across for a quick single and had the throw met the target Malik would have been run out
pushes a length delivery to mid-off
fuller and driven to mid-off again
outside the off stump, Younis goes hard at the cover drive and gets an inside edge to the leg side
leans forward to turn it to square leg
around the off stump, driven to mid-off
slower one just outside off and Malik is early into the cut and chops it behind the stumps

Wicket no 2. Malik goes. Malik went back and across to cut a short of length delivery low to left of backward point where it's held smartly. Fab catch that. He had to go low to his left and lunge forward as well.
outside off stump, pushed to the off side
short of length outside off stump, straightens and Yousuf wrists it through cover point. Classy on-the-up stroke.
full pitched, driven to left of mid-off for a single
just outside off stump, from a length and Yousuf is late in leaning forward to defend and gets a thick edge
on a length, around the off stump, pushed to mid-off
overpitched outside off and Younis drives it crisply to the left of mid-off. Fluent flowing off drive.

short of length outside off and Younis, on the front foot, goes very hard at the pull shot and doesn't time it well but there was enough wood on the ball to take it to the boundary. The fielder tried to drag it back in from the ropes but his feet touched the ground in the process.
fullish, outside off stump, run down to wide third man
fullish, just outside off stump, driven to covers
slower one, just outside off, tapped to the off side
walks outside the off stump and plays a lovely chip shot straight over the bowler. Imperious. Bottom-hand powered stroke
again he walks across, ending outside the off stump, the bowler sends it outside off and tapped to point
leans forward to drive a full delivery back to the bowler
It was on a length, on the off stump line but Younis Khan just thrust his left foot across and swung it past short fine leg. Not a paddle but a ferocious lap around the corner.
on the middle stump line, shaping in, turned to midwicket
well outside off stump, Yousuf is  early into the cut and edges it back down the track
elegant cover drive. He reached out to a full delivery outside off stump and timed it well
And now straight down the ground. Deliciously timed. He went forward and chipped a full delivery over the bowler's head
wide outside off stump, Yousuf reaches out and gets it down to wide third man
leans forward to drive a slower one to mid-off
pitched up, Yousuf gets on the front foot and defends
on off, a bit of turn, played with soft hands by Yousuf towards backward point
another single
on middle and leg this time, Yousuf turns it away square for another single
defended on the front foot
pitched up again, driven to long-off for a single
wide outside the off stump, driven to sweeper cover
straighter, pushed to mid-on
leans across to push a full delivery to covers
comes in towards the middle stump, tapped to square leg
leans across to a full delivery to sweeper cover
again wide outside the off stump and Younis gets his 33rd ODI fifty with a square drive.
floated outside off stump, paddled away deftly to fine-leg boundary
just outside the off stump, turning away, cut through backward point
leans forward to defend another left-arm orthodox spinner
goes down on his knee to paddle a delivery on the off stump and edges it to the on side
leans forward to push a flighted delivery to the off side
slower in the air, flighted one on the middle, pushed to covers
flat and quick, on the off stump and defended on the front foot
slower through the air, on the off stump line, turned past square leg
leans forward to push a flighted delivery to covers
short of length, just outside off, Yousuf goes back to punch it to mid-on region
fuller, on the middle and leg, worked to midwicket
goes back to wrist a full delivery past square leg for a single
leans forward to push a full delivery back to the bowler
Yousuf is gone. Big wicket for the left-arm spinner Nadeem. Flighted delivery outside the off stump and Yousuf top edged the sweep shot to backward square leg
flights it on the middle stump, driven inside-out to covers
fuller, pushed to the off side
just outside off stump, pushed to backward point
quick delivery on the middle stump line, tapped to the off side
comes in with the arm, turned to square leg
fuller, Misbah lunges forward to push it through mid-on region
on the middle stump line, turned to midwicket
sweeps a full delivery from the off stump to deep square leg region
just outside off stump, punched to mid-on
slow through the air, just outside off stump, pushed back to the bowler
another sweep shot, uppish but he will get two runs down to deep backward square leg
The slog sweep that he used so brilliantly against India in the Bangladesh Tri-series final is out again. He lunges forward and clatters a flighted delivery from outside off to deep midwicket region
on the off stump line, defended on the front foot
slow and full, paddled to fine leg. Deft placement.

Nadeem has another wicket. What a game he is having. Despite being slog swept and paddled for boundaries he kept bowling slow and has been rewarded. He sucked Younis Khan down the track with a flighted delivery before turning it past him and leaving him stranded
leans forward to turn to midwicket
fuller, right up there on the off stump line, driven to long-off
flat delivery, not much turn ,- that seems to be his style of bowling, completely oppsite to that of Nadeem - just outside off, dabbed through backward point
leans forward to push a full delivery to mid-off
full and on the middle and leg, turned through midwicket
slower through the air, just outside off stump, defended on the front foot
leans forward to defend a flighted delivery on the middle and off stump line
Watch out for that man Nadeem. Does Misbah in by an arm-ball. Misbah's bat came outside the line, playing for the turn but the ball went on straight. Plumb.
leans forward to push a flighted delivery to the off side
flighted outside off stump, square driven to sweeper cover
leans forward to tap a full delivery behind square leg
flighted one on the middle, Afridi wants to turn it inside-out to covers but edges it down the track
flat and quick, just outside off stump, pushed to backward point.
turning in from just outside off, taken on the pad outside off, trying to defend
fuller, on the middle, takes out the front leg from the line and drives to long-on
quick and just outside off stump, driven to long-off
just outside off stump, flat trajectory again and jabbed to the off side
waits for it to come in before tapping it to the on side
slow through the air, turning in from just outside off, worked to backward point
a tad short and Fawad rocks back to cut through backward point
lands it on a length around off and turns it away, Afridi stands at his crease to force it to wide long-off region

What a day Nadeem has had. He must be thinking this ODI cricket is too easy. Afridi in the bag now. He flighted it on the middle and leg stump, slow and dipping, Afridi didn't quite lean forward and checked his drive as the ball dipped rapidly on him and couldn't keep it down. Nadeem swooped low to his right-ankle height to pouch it.
on the middle stump line, jabbed to square leg
turns in from just outside off, Fawad first goes forward before pressing back to turn it to the on side
low dipping full toss, driven to extra cover
on the middle stump, plays it across the line to the leg side. Risky business that.
with a slightly round-arm action, on the leg and middle, worked to square leg
leans across to push a delivery on the off stump to long-on

full toss outside off stump and it's forced through covers. The captain had taken out the sweeper cover as he had pressed  8 men inside the circle to apply pressure. 8 men in the ring! What a day for Hong Kong cricket.
leans forward to defend to the off side
just outside off, cut to backward point
loopy flighted delivery that dips rapidly on the middle and leg line, pushed back to bowler
leans across to defend a flighted delivery to the off side
outside off stump, cut to point.
arm-ball and that hits the batsman on the pad but struck him just outside off.
another one that comes in with the arm, pushed cautiously to the off side
straightens from short of length, turned to midwicket region
that penchant to play across the line is getting him into trouble. He gets a leading edge to delivery on the off and middle line and it goes in the air but lands safely in the short cover region
turned to backward square leg
sweeps from outside off to backward square leg
full and outside off, driven to left of long-off
lands it on short of length, on the middle, nudged to point
loopy delivery outside off stump, squeezed to short third man

A run out now. What a strange day this has been for Pakistan. Nothing has gone right,. It was pushed to midwicket, yes... no ..yes no and gone. Sarfraz couldn't get back in time to beat the throw at the non-striker's end from Butt.
turning in from outside off, dabbed to backward point
fuller, on the off stump line, defended down the track
leans forward to push a flighted delivery down the track
spins in from outside off, from short of length, cut to covers
round-arm. quick. flat. full. almost yorker length, dug out to the off side
slower  this time, defended to the off side
driven to long-on for a single
plants his front leg across, then takes it out from the line to defend
goes back to tuck a full delivery to midwicket.
again goes back to tuck a delivery turning in to square leg
just outside off, slow through the air, not much turn and he is beaten trying to cut.
goes back to punch a delivery turning in to him to long-on
flighted one outside off stump, loopy delivery, driven to long-off
on the off and middle, pushed to the on side of the wicket
really full outside off stump, chopped to short third man
nice loopy well-flighted delivery, it went above the eye-line before dipping rapidly and it's pushed to the leg side
again he presses his front leg too much across before withdrawing it a hurry to dig out a full delivery on the middle
short and outside off but cut straight to point
stays back to force a delivery on the off stump to mid-off
fuller one but drifts down leg side, clipped straight to man standing just behind square leg
turns in from outside off stump, pushed to long-off
leans forward to flick a full delivery on the leg stump to deep square leg
tossed up outside off stump, driven through extra cover
slower through the air, tapped to cover point for a quick single
full and just outside off stump, squeezed through backward point
low full toss, eased to long-on for a single
slows up the pace, lands it just outside off stump, nudged to point for a single and they will take another one on the over throw
on the middle and off, worked to deep midwicket
short of length and is cut away through covers
flatter, on the off and middle, dabbed back to the bowler
nearly on the block hole, dug out towards mid-on region
on the middle and leg, swung out to deep square leg
quick delivery, short of length, cut to point
turns a delivery from outside off, with the spin, to midwicket
this time gets it past the midwicket fielder for a single
tossed up on the middle and off, driven to long-on
just outside off stump, turning in, worked to midwicket
fullish, on the middle and leg, driven to long-off
slows up the pace, turns in, dabbed to off side
fullish outside the offstump, he digs it out back to the bowler
bowls it fullish outside the offstump and he flicks his wrists, leans forward and works it wide of midwicket
the slower ball, lands full outside off and he quietly taps it down towards mid-off
holds the length back outside off and Tanvir has a slash at it and misses
slightly wider outside off and he connects on the cut this time and places it wide of point
kind of an ugly stroke but he'll take it... He stretches out to a wide delivery outside off and the under edge beats the diving keeper and they sneak a boundary
pushed to point for a quick single
gets forward and drives back to the bowler
leans forward and places it to cover
turns his wrists and works it down to midwicket
leans forward and pushes it to cover
full and wide outside the offstump, he gets forward and drives to extra cover
full and outside off, he stays at the crease and tees-off high over mid-on, that was just a few inches short of the rope
fullish outside off again and he merely pushes it through the line down to long-off
full outside off again and he pushes it to long-off
cutting away from short of length, placed to point region
fuller one, trying to hit the blockhole, pushed to long-off. 200 up for Pakistan
slower one, pushed to mid-on
on the middle, worked to midwicket

Appeal for stumping as Tanvir stumbles while trying to drive and lifts his back leg just in the air and lands it on the crease. Did the 'keeper break the stumps when he was on the line or did he get back in time. Third umpire is looking and Not out is the verdict. Fair decision. Too much doubt.
outside off stump, squeezed to short third man
leans forward to drive to long-on
comes in from outside off stump, nudged to backward point
driven back to the bowler
on the middle, turned to left of midwicket
turns in to the pad, tucked to short fine leg
full one, driven to long-on
turns in from outside off, pushed back to the bowler
on the middle, driven to long-on
swept hard to deep square leg
slow through the air, lands outside off, dabbed close on the on side for a quick single
straighter one outside off stump, squeezed off the outer edge to third man region
full and just outside off stump, again nudged to right of short third man
stretches across to paddle sweep to fine leg. 50 of the partnership is up
leans forward to drive to long-on
floated outside off, pushed back to the bowler
spins in from outside off, tickled behind square leg
lunges across to push a full delivery to left of backward point
steps down the track but mistimes a heave to deep midwicket
turns in from outside off, pushed through cover point
another single, this time to left of midwicket
on the middle and leg, swept to deep midwicket for a single
goes back to crash a short-of-length delivery outside off stump to extra cover boundary
plants his front leg across, then is made to wait by the loopy delivery and he nudges it to cover point
full and outside off, turned to midwicket
Ah! the reverse sweep. The switch hit. But not a beefy hit but a delicate reverse paddle
flighted outside off, driven to left of sweeper cover
leans across to sweep a full delivery from outside off and that speeds away to the boundary
well outside the off stump, cut to left of sweeper cover
turning in to Sohail who nudges it  to the leg side
gets to his fifty with a booming off drive. He stretched well across to get to the pitch of a flighted delivery outside off and drove it cleanly
steps down the track to play a pick-up stroke to a full delivery on the leg and middle to long leg
the boundaries are flowing in now. On the legs, flicked to fine-leg boundary. On 46 now.
fullish, on the middle stump, driven to left of long-off
pretty full, on the middle, pushed down to long-off
wide down the leg side and 250 is up
yorker length delivery, stabbed to the on side
low full toss, punched to long-off. Will Tanvir now employ the long handle?
he does but drives straight, one bounce, to long-off
slower one, Tanvir loses balance while trying to lap it around the corner, his feet was outside the crease but the 'keeper couldn't collect it
on the middle and leg and Tanvir brings up the hundred of the partnership with a swing to deep square leg boundary

full and on the off stump, driven straight to long-off. But it has been a very good knock from Sohail Tanvir. He stitched together a 100-run partnership with Fawad Alam to get Pakistan out of the hole.
just outside off stump, pushed to point
change of pace, the slower one - 100kmph- from the back of the hand and Gul is beaten outside off stump
wide outside off stump as he attempts another slower one
leans forward to push a length delivery to the off side
slower one, outside off, driven to sweeper cover
yorker on the off stump, jabbed out
on the legs, full, and he is struck on the pad trying to flick it away
low full toss outside off stump, swatted to long-off
full one outside off stump, edges a drive to third man

on the middle and leg, whipped to midwicket where it's misfield by Dar the captain. And Fawad will take it; it's his maiden ODI fifty. Generous applause from the crowd and his team-mates in the dressing room
almost yorker length one, dug out well by Gul
slower one on the stumps, Alam stands outside the off stump and was about to launch himself in to a big drive before he picked up the change of pace and nudged it to the off side
another slower one, this time ends up as a low full toss outside off stump, swatted past midwicket
fullish one on the leg and middle, whipped to deep midwicket
The slog sweep is out. Low full toss on the middle and Alam went down on his knee to sweep it to deep square leg boundary
slower one, on the middle and leg, off a length, punched to left of long-off for couple of runs
and it's another slower one, on the pads, tucked past square leg
swings a full delivery to the midwicket region and will come back for the second run
moves outside leg stump and digs out a low full toss, an attempted yorker, to long-on where a tumbling catch is held
drills a full pitched delivery to long-on
on the middle stump line, rotates strike with a push through the off side
length delivery on the middle, he has a slog, gets a inside-edge to the leg side, is not sure where it is but Rao calls him over for a single
low full toss on the off stump line, driven through covers, a fumble and that allows Pakistan to end up on 288 for 9

inn2.comm: well outside the off stump, Sarfraz dives to his right and gets an awkward bounce and the ball bounds off the shoulder
just shaping outside off stump, he intends to poke before withdrawing his bat away from the line
length delivery on the middle and leg stump line, tucked behind square leg
straightens after landing on a length around middle and off, nudged to the off side
on the middle and off stump line, dabbed to the off side
leans forward to defend a fuller delivery to mid-off
full and just outside off stump, pushed to covers
on the middle, tapped close on the leg side and they hurry through for a single
swings in but it starts from the leg stump and goes down leg
lands on a length around off stump and goes further away, left alone
closer to the off stump and he pushes inside the line and the ball bounces once before it reaches the 'keeper . Akram reckons Sarfraz is standing too deep
on the middle, turned to the leg side
slips down the leg side. He is yet to find his radar
lands on a length around middle and leg, moves towards middle and the batsman gets a leading edge on a defensive prod and the ball flies towards backward point
just short of length outside off stump and he goes back  to force it through point
bouncer and he ducks
another bouncer and again he ducks to evade.Two bouncers after that first-ball four
cuts this one off a length, nudged to the on side for a single
fuller, around the off stump, leans forward to defend to the off side
in the zone outside off stump, holding its line, he takes care not to chase it
down the leg side and Sarfraz collects
huge shout for lbw. Tanvir is bowling from round the stumps and it hit him in front of middle. It would have hit the leg stump
he leans forward to defend to the off side
just outside the off stump, gets an inside edges on the drive
beaten on the cut. Just outside off stump, coming in, Tabarak shapes to cut
sharp and well-directed bouncer on the left shoulder and he manages to sway away just  in time
French cut. Fullish and outside off stump, he stood rooted to the crease, had a flash outside off stump and gets a profitable edge
around the off stump, jabbed to the off side
on a length , on the middle and off, keeps a touch low, defended to the off side
opened the bat-face and glided a length delivery through cover point
full pitched outside off stump and driven past covers where it's mis fielded by Afridi
leans forward to push to Afridi
another bouncer - there have been a few already - swayed away in time.

on a length, coming in and defended to the leg side. Tanvir rushed across, picked the ball, turned around and hurled a throw at the non-striker's end but Skhawat Ali turns across and gets between the ball and the stumps and is hit on the back side.
comes in from round the stumps, to beat the forward prod and hits  the pad outside the off stump
short and climbing outside off, too close to cut but he tries and is beaten by the extra bounce
well outside the off stump, left alone.
full and well outside off stump, swing and a miss and Sarfraz gathers behind the stumps
leg cutter outside off stump, run down to third man
Blasted over covers. full and outside off stump, the captain drives it inside-out over covers
beaten outside off stump. The slower one. It cut in from just outside off and Dar was searching for it
another slower one, keeps low, jabbed to the off side
well-directed bouncer, head-high, and it curved away after landing around the middle and off line and the batsman was squared up but managed to evade it

134.8 kmph bouncer crashes into bottom of the helmet grill and the jaw.He couldn't get away this time. The helmet comes off now and he is in pain. The ball had hit the bottom of the grill as he tried to jerk his head away and must have hit his jaw has well. Rameez Raja deadpans, "that grilled his jaw". The physio is out there. Tabarak is stretched out on the ground and he now slowly gets up. Tabarak is now walking off the field.
well wide outside off stump and Sarfraz makes a tumbling take in front of the first slip
just outside off stump, moving away, beaten on the poke
on the middle stump line, nudged across the line to the leg side
on the off stump line, pushed to the off side
banged in short, just outside leg and he top-edged the pull shot straight to fine leg
yorker just outside off stump from round the stumps , dug out to backward point
spears in from wide of the crease, pushed to the off side

Strikes the timber first ball. It came in from short of length towards the middle and off stump line and went through the defenses. The bat came down in an angle, he was squared up as well and that combo usually doesn't work out well.
slips down the leg side and Sarfraz makes a half-stop
well outside off stump, moving away, left alone
short of length, skids on the middle stump line, goes for the pull, misses and it bounds away of the pad. Struck high.
moving away from the off stump, left alone
pushed to backward point where Alam rushes in to flick an diving under-arm throw but misses the stumps. The batsman would have made it in time anyway
yorked him! It crashes into the base of the middle stump. He tried to bring the bat down but couldn't close the gate in time.
bouncer from wide of the crease and the while ball flies past the helmet
well outside the off stump, left alone
goes for the yorker, serves a full one on the legs and it's whipped through square leg
slower one well outside off stump, no stroke offered
from wide of the crease, he pings the pad but it's going down leg. Stifled appeal.
on a length, just outside off stump, dabbed to third man
fuller, straighter, turned to the leg side
cuts in to beat the defensive poke and thuds into the pad. Going down leg, though
length delivery on the off and middle, skids on to the bat quickly and runs off the face of the blade to cover point.
cuts in towards middle, pushed to the on side
fuller, on that middle and off line, steered to point
leans forward to push a full one to covers
still from round the stumps, on the pads, it runs away to short fine leg
almost cleaned up the leg stump. He was late in getting the bat down to defend a length delivery that kept a tad low and got a bottom edge
stretches across to punch a length delivery through extra cover. The bowler thought it hit the pad first
just outside off stump, guided to point
leans forward to get a inside-edge on the defensive prod
cuts in from just outside off stump and strikes him on the pad high as he stretches forward to defend
The middle stump has been pegged back. Another nip backer and he doesn't get behind the line, neither does he bring the bat in line in time. Crash.
full and outside the off stump, pushed to the off side
slipping on the middle and leg line and bounds away off the pads
leans forward to a length delivery to defend to the off side
Fires in a bouncer, Atkinson just about sways away
fuller, on a length, on the middle line, pushed to the off side
waist-high full toss outside off stump, stabbed to backward point
rushing through the channel outside off and Atkinson is beaten as he pushes inside the line
further outside off and square driven to point
low full toss, driven straight to covers
close shout for lbw. It cut in towards middle and leg and struck the pad even as the batsman lunged forward to defend. The hawk eye suggests it would have hit the leg

And again. A tad fuller and again he was hit on the middle and leg line as he pressed his front leg a bit too much across. Again it would have taken out the leg stump. Pakistan didn't have any luck with the umpiring in the Bangladesh Tri series final as well
now almost a run out. Fawad Alam rushed in to stop a ball pushed towards covers and fired in a throw at the nonstriker's hand and misses. Had he hit ...
that front leg is being pressed dangerously across but he manages to get his bat around the pad in time to squeeze a full delivery to square leg
run out chance missed. It was steered to left of backward point where Alam makes a fine diving acrobatic stop, gets up and lobbies a throw above Gul's head and the ball bounces past the stumps -
Gul hurls yet another bouncer and it crashes into the left shoulder
fuller, on the middle and off, defended to the off side
fullish, on the middle, worked to mid-on
on the middle and off stump line, defended on the front foot
really full in length, on the middle and off, pushed to cover point for a single
just outside the off stump, holds its line and he lunges across to get a edge to third man
Shot boss. Fullish, outside off stump and he drove it superbly through extra cover
124.4 kmph slower one that held its line outside off, Atkinson checked his drive, played it with soft hands and it runs off the outside edge to third man
full and straight, stabbed to the on side
around the off stump, defended to the on side
slider that keeps a touch low, turned off the back foot to midwicket
pushed to covers
googly strikes the pad but just outside the off stump
just outside off stump, steered to point
on the leg and middle line, strikes the pad again
leans forward to defend and inside edges a delivery turning in on the middle and leg line to the on side
on the middle stump line, turned to wide mid-on
leans forward to defend a length delivery on the off stump
homing in on the off stump, defended to the off side
on the middle and leg, squeezed past square leg
short and climbing outside off, left alone
follows the bouncer with a full delivery on the off stump, pushed to covers
leans forward to defend to the off side
slower and it spins from the middle and leg line and the batsman gets a leading edge down the track
on the middle and leg, worked past square leg
loopy flighted delivery down the leg side and the batsman fails to connect with the sweep shot
on the middle and off, full, driven to the off side
bowls the off spinner, back into the pads, he goes back to whip it to backward square leg boundary
again outside leg. Another wide
full and outside off stump, driven to wide extra cover region
flighted on middle and leg, he turns it to short fine leg for a single
bowls it flatter and catches him on the pads just outside the line of legstump, they appeal
short and wide outside off, he slams it to Misbah at deep cover
he stays back and chips it just over midwicket's grasp
floated down the legside, he turns it to short fine leg
he stays back to a ball that stops on him a little, he punches it past the bowler to long-off
defended on the front foot
timber! He bowls the flighted legbreak on line with the offstump, Atkinson fails to read the flight and plays all around it as the ball straightens and pegs the offstump back
that was the whippy medium pacer! Boy you should have seen that coming, he manages to tuck it to mid-on
pitches on middle and leg, he defends
defended on the front foot back to the bowler
flighted outside off, he leans forward and pushes through the line to long-off
defends forward and the ball nearly rolls back to the stumps
defended back to the bowler on the front foot
slides wide down the legside
flighted on middle and leg, he nudges it to the on side
flighted on middle and leg, he nudges it wide of short fine leg for a single
flighted on middle, tapped back to the bowler
wide down the legside
fires that flat and fast and beats the hapless batsman
fired on the pads, he turns it to the on side
takes a couple of paces down the track for the loft, he suddenly checks his stroke and chips it over the bowler's head
flighted outside off, he pushes it to long-off
the top spinner clips the pads and lobs up for Sarfraz to take the catch
holds the length back outside off, he rocks back and slashes to Alam at point
gets forward and pushes back to the bowler
gets a big stride across and defends back to the bowler
nurdles it in front of square leg for a quick single
gets forward and softly taps it to point
flighted outside off, he defends back to the bowler
pushes that flatter and faster, he defends to the on side
pushes it to square leg
gets forward and pushes to cover
gets a big stride forward and defends back to the bowler
pushed towards point, there's a slight misunderstanding with the running but Butt makes it home after the direct hit
gets forward and pushes to silly point
attempts to sweep but he fails to make contact with the bat
gets forward and pushes through the .line to long-off
slides on the pads and he works it down to short fine leg
this time he turns it wide of short fine leg for a run
stays back at the crease and punches it past the bowler to long-off
gets across and tucks it wide of square leg
stays back and defends back to the bowler
leans forward to defend a delivery on the middle stump
slower in the air, on the middle and leg line, tickled behind square leg
lands outside leg stump, swept to short fine-leg region
tossed outside off stump, scooped hard and it bounds off Younis Khan at silly point and over covers. Younis must be hurt there as it ricocheted of his head. he was not wearing a helmet.
short of length, skidding on to the leg stump line, lapped around the corner
spins in, pushed back to the bowler
turns in from outside off, pushed to extra cover
goes back to turn a delivery turning in to short fine leg
tossed up on the middle, slog swept to midwicket boundary
flighted on the middle, goes for the reverse sweep but doesn't connect well
reverts back to the conventional sweep and picks up another boundary. Munir Dar is certainly looking to be pretty aggressive here
leans forward to defend
loopy spinning delivery from middle and leg, Tabarak misses a sweep and is hit on the pad in front of middle
on the off stump line, dabbed off the outer edge to the off side
goes back to push a googly back to the bowler
short and well outside off stump, cut hard to the point boundary
sweeps a fuller delivery for a single
spins away sharply past the off stump, he doesn't chase it but just pushes inside the line
stretches across to take a delivery leaving the off stump on the pad
lets this one to turn past him
lunges forward to defend
a touch short and is cut past point
turns in to beat the waft and bounds off the pad to short fine leg
on the off stump line, edges it to the on side
low full toss, swatted to mid-on
on the middle, swept to long leg
short and well outside the off stump and cut to deep point
on the middle and leg, paddled to short fine leg
on the middle and leg, jabbed to the on side
turning away, steered to third man
spinning away, cut to sweeper cover
that sweep again and will pick up a single to Tanvir at long leg
full, lands outside leg and turns into the middle and leg line, hit on the pad, trying to defend. Malik asks the question
Najeeb Amar too unfurls the slog sweep and picks up a boundary
turns past the outside edge ; the batsman was trying to defend
that good old slog and he will pick up yet another boundary to the wide long-on region
lands outside leg, turns in, defended to the on side
lands outside leg and stays there, wide called
pushes a delivery on the middle and leg, with the turn to covers

Munir Dar is run out. He had nudged close on the leg side and kept running. No response from Amar, though. Meanwhile, Sarfraz rushes across, picks the ball and gets back to break the stumps. Munir was livid with his partner
leans forward to push a full delivery to covers
outside the off stump, beaten on the flirt. Sarfraz reckons there is an edge and screams out an appeal. Not given.
short and outside off, cut through backward point
low full toss and Nadeem didn't pick it up till late and pats it back. Both the bowler and the batsman laugh
turns in to beat the defensive poke and bobs away of the pad
short of length but turns in sharply, edges a cut and it bounces to the left of the lunging slip
leans forward to defend a full delivery outside off
short of length , outside off stump, punched to the off side
loopy dipping delivery outside off, squeezed to point
low full toss, driven back to the bowler
flatter, outside off, driven to left of mid-off where Tanvir makes a diving tumbling stop
just outside off stump, short of length, flat, pushed to left of covers
misses a stumping chance. It was down the leg side, the batsman fails to connect his flick shot and gets outside the crease but Sarfraz doesn't collect.
driven to long-on for a single
leans forward to defend
pushed to the off side
full and on the leg and middle line, driven back
short and turning away from the off stump, cut through point
it lands full on the middle stump, the batsman doesn't connect with the sweep shot and is struck in front
Nadeem Ahmed swings a flighted delivery on the legs to deep midwicket. And it's all over. Abbas won't come out to bat and the game is done.
